CustomField.formula: if( AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__DocumentType__c, 'Executed Document') || ISPICKVAL(Apttus__DocumentType__c, 'Agreement Document') || ISPICKVAL(Apttus__DocumentType__c, 'Other'), not(Apttus__IsTransient__c), OR( ISNULL(DE_Status__c ), ISBLANK(DE_Status__c ), DE_Status__c = 'Failed' ) ) ,HYPERLINK("/apex/DE_DecisionEnginesAPI?id=" + Id, "Send to AI","_self"),"")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Send Document to AI for Extraction of Clauses
CustomField.label: Send to AI
